edu.cnm.deepdive.celestialbodies.util

Class Geometry

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cnm.deepdive.celestialbodies.util.Geometry

  • public class Geometry
extends Object
    This class is used by the Celestial Bodies app for necessary calculations for determining right ascension and declination.
